body:
I don’t understand why certain shippers feel the need to comment on posts of ships they don’t like. They’re not going to change their minds - if anything, they’re probably just going to make others dislike their ships even more (assuming that’s the case.) it’s counter productive.

That aside, the art is so soft looking. I love it.^^
@roxas9519 It doesn't even work the other way, bro. You're so dumb. This is an IchiRuki post, what the fuck are you IchiHimes doing here? Lmao.

@TheSeaDragoon @フリップモンク It's funny how the Ichirukis have to come to these kinds of posts to comment on their trash. I mean, I understand that it must hurt that nobody is interested in publishing anything about their ship, but please, a little dignity

Not the ichirukis here lmfao, so cringe
Not the IchiHimes here lmfao, so cringe.

It's funny how the Ichihimes have to come to these kinds of posts to comment on their trash.
I mean, I understand that it must hurt that nobody is interested in publishing anything about their ship, but please, a little dignity
Orihime is still the best choice. Good job for making the right call, Tite Kubo.
Even though there's not much dialogue it's still wholesome
wholesome, after reading a ton of shit, this was refreshing
This was just really wholesome, I love it
Orihime was the right Route to go
